title: Steelers hire Jahri Evans as assistant OL coach, add four other assistants

sources.name: Pro Football Talk
sources.title: Steelers hire Jahri Evans as assistant OL coach, add four other assistants
sources.description: Jahri Evans will find out later this week if he has been elected to the Pro Football Hall of Fame, but he'll have a new job for the 2026 season either way.
